item.title: Feature Overview
item.description: floki aims to provide reproducible and shareable build tooling. It does this by helping you run docker containers interactively from a declarative yaml file. The ideal workflow is clone the source repository run floki build floki has a number of features to help achieve this. The following outlines the current list.
